import React, {useState} from "react"; function OrderChangePage({order, cartItems, modifyCart, changeOrder}){ const [name, setName] = useState("") return (

Change Order

Cart

    {cartItems.map(item =>

    {item.name} (${parseFloat(item.price).toFixed(2)}) x{item.quantity}

    )}

Total: ${parseFloat(cartItems.reduce((total, item) => total + item.price * item.quantity, 0)).toFixed(2)}

e.preventDefault()}>
) } export default OrderChangePage
